General_Description: '''False Idols''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Bandits impersonating priests accosted [[Civilians|innocents]] and demanded their possessions as offerings. A priestess feared these false prophets would turn people from the worship of [[Minerva|Athena]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
